407:8: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī punareva bhagavantametadavocat– adyāsmākaṃ bhagavan deśaya tvamavalokiteśvarasya guṇaviśeṣam||
407:22: eteṣu parvatarājeṣvekaikaṃ lokadhātuṣu śakyate mayā parvatarājānāṃ palāni vā palaśatāni vā palasahasrāṇi vā palakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi vā saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi śakyate mayā kulaputra gaṇayitum|
407:23: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum|
407:24: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā paramāṇurajasāṃ pramāṇamudgṛhītum,
407:25: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum|
407:26: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā mahāsamudrasyaikaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum,
407:27: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate mayā puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum|
407:28: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasyaikaikāni patrāṇi gaṇayitum,
407:29: na tu kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya śakyate puṇyasaṃbhāraṃ gaṇayitum||
407:30: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra sumeruḥ parvatarājo bhūryarāśirbhavet|
407:32: caturdvīpanivāsinaḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikādayaḥ sarve te lekhakā bhaveyuḥ|
407:36: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin dvādaśa gaṅgānadīvālukopamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāścīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ samupasthitā bhaveyuḥ|
407:39: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin avalokiteśvaraḥ anekaiḥ samādhiśataiḥ samanvāgataḥ|
407:78: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra krakucchando nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
407:79: tena kālena tena samayena ahaṃ dānaśūro nāma bodhisattvo'bhūvam|
407:80: tadā etasya tathāgatasya puraḥ sthitvā īdṛśamavalokiteśvarasamantabhadrayoḥ samādhivigraho mayā dṛṣṭaḥ|
407:82: yadā samantabhadro bodhisattvo vajrodgataṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:86: yadā samantabhadro vicchuritaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:88: yadā samantabhadra ākārakaraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:90: yadā samantabhadro bhadrarājaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:91: tadā avalokiteśvaraḥ sāgaragambhīraṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede|
407:92: yadā samantabhadraḥ siṃhaviṣkambhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:94: yadā samantabhadro varadāyakaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpede,
407:100: atha krakucchandastathāgatastametadavocat–alpaṃ tvayā kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ dṛṣṭam |
407:101: yādṛśamavalokiteśvarasya pratibhānaṃ tādṛśaṃ tathāgatānāṃ na saṃvidyate|
407:102: īdṛśaṃ mayā kulaputra krakucchandasya tathāgatasya sakāśācchrutam||
407:103: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–deśayatu me bhagavān kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ yena vayaṃ dharmarasenāpūryamāṇāḥ saṃtṛptāḥ bhavema|
407:108: īdṛśānāṃ pāparatānāṃ sattvānāṃ tadapi kāraṇḍavyūho mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute ||
407:109: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kathaṃ jānāmyahaṃ bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpaparimokṣaṇaṃ kurute?
407:110: bhagavānāha–asti kulaputra sumeroḥ parvatarājasya dakṣiṇapārśve saptabhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairmalanirmalau tīrthau parikalpitau|
407:114: evameva kulaputra idaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati|
407:116: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin varṣākālasamaye sarvāṇi tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ sarve nīlābhi(rūpā) bhavanti|
407:117: atha śatamukho nāma nāgarājaḥ bhavanādavatīrya sarvāstā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīrdahati|
407:118: evamevāyaṃ kulaputraṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ sarvapāpāni dahati,
407:121: ya imaṃ kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraṃ ratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti|
407:122: na te kulaputra pṛthagjanā iti vaktavyāḥ|
407:124: teṣāṃ ca maraṇakāraṇasamaye dvādaśa tathāgatā upasaṃkramya āśvāsayanti–mā bhaiṣīḥ kulaputra|
407:131: evaṃ kulaputra teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sukhamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati|
407:132: athāvalokiteśvaro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte prakrāntaḥ|
407:134: ta ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garūḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyāḥ prakrāntāḥ ||
407:135: yadā te prakrāntāstadāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat–deśayatu me bhagavānasmākaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaram|
407:139: mārocayitavyaṃ śuddhayate bhadanta nānāvāsaṃ na ca yatra nānāvāse'sthīni saṃvidyante|
407:145: kiṃ bahunā? bhikṣavo duḥśīlena bhikṣuṇā nānāvāsaṃ na kartavyam,
407:148: duḥśīlānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyāṇāṃ madhye āvāso na dātavyaḥ |
407:153: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat–katame kāle bhagavannīdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti?
407:154: bhagavānāha–tṛtīye varṣaśatagate mama parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya īdṛśādakṣiṇīyā bhaviṣyanti,
407:157: te sāṃghikaṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vaṃśikopabimbopadhānakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ asatparibhogena paribhokṣyante|
407:158: ye ca sāṃghikopacāre uccāraṃ prasrāvaṃ kurvanti,
407:159: te vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāmuccāraprasrāve gūḍhamṛttikodare prāṇino jāyante |
407:164: hīnendriyā dagdhasthūṇākṛtibhirasthipatravaducchritaiḥ svakeśaromapraticchannaiḥ parvatodarasaṃnibhaiḥ sūcīchidropamamukhaiḥ kāye īdṛśaṃ te duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti|
407:175: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti|
407:177: te dvādaśa kalpān raurave mahānarake upapadyante|
407:184: tadā bhikṣavaḥ karmavāyavo vānti yena te mṛtāḥ purūṣāḥ punareva jīvanti|
407:186: tataḥ teṣāṃ karmopagānāṃ karmavaśānāṃ mahatī jihvā prādurbhavati|
407:188: evaṃ te bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti|
407:190: tataste yamapālapuruṣā gṛhītvā ca tasya jihvāyāṃ sūcīśatasahasraṃ vidhyanti|
407:196: evaṃ parikramatāṃ teṣāṃ trayaḥ kalpāḥ parīkṣīyante|
407:205: ye śīlavanto guaṇavantaḥ prajñāvantastairbhikṣava imāni śikṣāpadāni mayā prajñaptāni dhārayitavyāni|
407:206: asatparibhogena bhikṣavo na paribhoktavyaṃ sāṃghikaṃ vastu agnighaṭopamam|
407:211: na tu sāṃghikasya vastunaḥ pratikāraṃ kartuṃ śakyate||
407:219: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ|
407:220: atha te mahāśrāvakāḥ svakaṃ svakaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ prakrāntāḥ|
407:221: te ca devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyāḥ,
407:226: te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti||
407:230: ye dharma hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat|
407:231: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ||
